explains: adj. 突然的；未经宣布的；未通知的

sentences.en: She just turned up unannounced on my doorstep.
sentences.cn: 她未打招呼就来到我家门口了。

sentences.en: He had just arrived unannounced from South America.
sentences.cn: 他刚从南美来，事先也没通知。

sentences.en: Much to the shock of everyone, Palmer comes unannounced to CTU.
sentences.cn: 很多反恐组的工作人员大吃一惊，帕默竟然没有打招呼就来到了反恐组。
